TopicTitle: A list of new parts for KSP

Articles.Content:
This is just a small list of parts that should be added to KSP

2.5 m LV2-N "Nuke"

.625 m high thrust lower efficiency ion engine

1.5 m high thrust medium efficiency ion engine

2.5 and 3.75 m nuclear reactor; runs on Uranium and leaves behind DepletedUranium

Various sized radiators and heat sinks

2.5 m aerospike

RTG runs on Blutonium resource

Ability to make your own part tabs, such as "electrical" or "mining"

Let me know what you think!
